mapper.select: SELECT FILE.IDX , FILE.CONTENT_TYPE , FILE.FILE_PATH , FILE.ORIGIN_FILE_NAME , FILE.SAVE_FILE_NAME , FILE.FILE_SIZE , FILE.WRITER , FILE.REG_DATE , FILE.STATE , REG_DATE FROM BOARD JOIN MAP ON BOARD.IDX = MAP.BOARD_IDX AND BOARD.IDX = #{boardIdx} JOIN FILE ON MAP.FILE_IDX = FILE.IDX AND FILE.IDX = #{fileIdx} WHERE BOARD.STATE = 1 AND FILE.STATE = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE SET STATE = 0 WHERE IDX = ( SELECT FILE.IDX FROM BOARD JOIN MAP ON BOARD.IDX = MAP.BOARD_IDX AND BOARD.IDX = #{boardIdx} JOIN FILE ON MAP.FILE_IDX = FILE.IDX AND FILE.IDX = #{fileIdx} WHERE BOARD.STATE = 1 AND FILE.STATE = 1 )
